New_Braunfels.New Braunfels Christian Academy: New Braunfels Christian Academy (NBCA) is a nonaccredited preschool - 12th grade school located in New Braunfels, Texas in the United States. NBCA is an independent, non-denominational school that serves the area as Comal County's largest private educational institution. Founded in 1981, NBCA is regarded as one of the leading schools in the area.
